author: jvanzyl
msg: o Cleaning up properties. Removing ${maven.home} and ${maven.repo.local}
from the project properties as the properties handling is working
correctly now and the last definition wins so that projects can
easily override default values and the above two values were
clobbering predefined values.

author: smor
msg: - Added a new goal : "graph:goals-to-xdoc".
With this you generate an xdoc document in ${maven.gen.docs}/goals-report.xml.
This shows you Maven's and the project's goals, their description and their
prerequisites.
- goalstoxdoc.dvsl processed the template
- GoalsToXML has been tweaked to sort the goals by name, so that in the output,
they are also sorted.
There is currently no link anywhere to the generated html file.
